snippet: Chinese buyers including materials giant Amer International and CITIC Securities Co Ltd are readying a rival 246 million pounds bid for English soccer club Southampton, a person with knowledge of the plans told Reuters....

headline.main: Vintage Western Phone Brands Resurrected by Chinese Players
headline.print_headline: Vintage Western Phone Brands Resurrected by Chinese Players

lead_paragraph: Chinese buyers including materials giant Amer International and CITIC Securities Co Ltd are readying a rival 246 million pounds bid for English soccer club Southampton, a person with knowledge of the plans told Reuters.
